items.title: User Activity Sharing
items.description: Enable users to share their workout activities with friends within the app.
acceptance_criteria: User can post completed workout summaries to a social feed
Friends can view, like, and comment on shared activities
Privacy settings allow users to control who can see their posts
non_functional: Feed updates should appear within 2 seconds of posting
Privacy settings must comply with relevant data protection regulations

items.title: Friends and Followers System
items.description: Allow users to connect with others by adding friends or following profiles.
acceptance_criteria: User can search for other users by name or email
User can send and accept friend requests
User can follow others without mutual confirmation
non_functional: Search results should return within 1 second
System should handle up to 10,000 connections per user without performance degradation

notes: The requirement is high-level; assumptions made include the existence of core fitness tracking functionality and user authentication. Social features are assumed to be in-app only, not integrated with external social networks.
